settings.heading: LOOT DROP III SALE
settings.desc: Use code LOOTDROP at checkout to get 30% off* storewide: Monitors, Headsets, Mics... are up for grabs!

settings.heading: Title with Description
settings.description_col_1: *Receive 30% off selected products advertised on https://uk.hyperx.com/collections/all-categories. Discount applied on https://uk.hyperx.com when using code LOOTDROP at online checkout. This offer will expire on 27/03/2023 at 23.59 GMT. Single use per customer. Available whilst stocks last. Requires acceptance of Terms and conditions of Sales and Service. Purchases made using this offer must be for personal use and not for resale. This offer is non-exchangeable, non-transferable and no cash alternative is offered, except as required by law. This offer cannot be used in conjunction with any other coupon code or price reduction promotion. HP reserves the right, acting reasonably and in accordance with all relevant legislation and codes of practice to change or cancel this offer at any time.
